tool_description: Calculates priority scores for customer reviews based on sentiment, customer importance, review visibility, and business impact to guide response urgency and resource allocation.

sentiment_score.description: Sentiment score from sentiment analysis (-1 to 1 scale)

review_platform.description: Platform where review was posted: google, yelp, amazon, facebook, internal

customer_tier.description: Customer tier: vip, premium, standard, new

days_since_purchase.description: Number of days since customer's purchase

error_messages: Invalid sentiment score: sentiment_score must be between -1 and 1.
Invalid review rating: review_rating must be an integer between 1 and 5.
Invalid platform: Use one of [google, yelp, amazon, facebook, internal].
Invalid customer tier: Use one of [vip, premium, standard, new].
Invalid review length: review_length must be a non-negative integer.
usage: Provide sentiment_score, review_rating, and review_platform as required parameters. Include customer_tier, review_length, and days_since_purchase for more accurate priority calculation. Higher priority scores indicate more urgent response needs.

priority_level.description: Priority classification: critical, high, medium, low

escalation_recommended.description: Whether escalation to human agent is recommended

priority_factors.description: Key factors contributing to the priority score
